attributes.action: Social workers to be equipped with body worn video
attributes.additional_details:
This safeguards families from being torn apart from personal accounts from a social worker with no evidence of fact that bwv would capture 

This also protects the proffesional from false claims and accusations as well as enhancing personal safety 

Misrepresentation of circumstances with no way of management reviewing. The equipping of bwv also can save costly public purse court cases and families being under heinous scrutiny
attributes.background: As above equip and enforce the use of BWV Body worn videos by social workers nationally.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/632509
